content: dream is a free afghan square and is included in julie yeager s crochet a long for 2019 you can read all about the cal here http //julieyeagerdesigns com/ dream is one square of the arctic and happy dreams collection the photo tutorial is made with the arctic square but you can also make it in the happy colours there is a scheme for the 3 arctic colours and also for the 7 happy colours listed in the pattern but of course you can use your own colours finished size will be 10 inches/ 25 4 cm if made with stylecraft special dk and hook size 4mm / g if you want to see more of my work and will stay up to date then please visit my crochet page something crochet https //www facebook com/something-crochet-1875698805791418/ happy hooking
